entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Deline
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -26.7°C

Condition: Mainly Sunny

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 32.
